org.hildan.waterloo.ces.config

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hildan.waterloo.ces.config.Config

  • public class Config
extends Object
    A singleton containing the values of the configuration file. If no such file exists, it is created with default values the first time this class is accessed.
    Author:
    Joffrey BION

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      CutPointsSet cutPointsSet
      The cut points set to use to level the actigraph's CPM.
      boolean deleteTempFiles
      Whether or not the intermediate file (containing phone epochs) must be deleted.
      int epochWidthVsK4b2
      The epoch width to use for the phone when compared to the K4b2 results, in seconds
      int windowWidthSec
      Window width in seconds

      • getClassifier

        public String getClassifier(Profile profile,
                   PhoneType phoneType)
        Returns the path to the XML file containing the classifier for the given profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile to get the classifier for.
        phoneType - The type of phone to get the classifier for.
        Returns:
        the path to the XML file containing the classifier for the given profile.

      • setClassifier

        public void setClassifier(Profile profile,
                 PhoneType phoneType,
                 String classifierPath)
        Sets the classifier path for the given profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - Holster or Pocket.
        phoneType - Gyro or not.
        classifierPath - The path to the XML classifier to assign to this profile.
